title: Who Fails To Pay Child Support? Moms, At A Higher Rate Than Dads
teaser: The number of dollars of unpaid child support each year in the U.S. is well into the billions. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with data expert Mona Chalabi of FiveThirtyEight.com about the numbers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
